bbox_hint.note: Covers cruise piers, San Miguel, beach clubs, and reefs

transit_routes.name: Taxi to San Miguel
transit_routes.note: Settle fare before getting in. Not metered. Walk is 45 min along coast.

transit_routes.name: Beach Club Shuttles
transit_routes.note: Most beach clubs provide pickup from all cruise piers.

featured_experiences.name: Snorkel Palancar Reef
featured_experiences.note: Book through ship or local operator. El Cielo often included.

featured_experiences.name: Beach Club Day
featured_experiences.note: Paradise Beach (families), Mr. Sanchos (party), Nachi Cocom (quiet).

featured_experiences.name: San Gervasio Mayan Ruins
featured_experiences.note: Less crowded than mainland ruins. Peaceful, atmospheric.
